name: 大學數學的回顧與統整
description: 本課程將大學數學基礎課程—線性代數、微積分—與現代數學研究串聯起來，點出基礎課程與後續課程的連結關鍵，讓學生在大學階段結束前反思所學知識，加強數學能力，提升數學品味。
goals: 以高觀點詮釋數學與其他學科連結
syllabus:
1.         Linear algebra: review on fundamentals, connections with analysis, combinatorics, differential equations, graph theory, etc. (5 weeks)

2.         Calculus: review on fundamentals, connections with geometry, physics, dynamic systems, applied mathematics, etc. (3 weeks)

3.         Expert colloquia: three experts to be invited to address how mathematics is used in their respective expertise. (3 weeks)

4.         Problem sessions: Discussions on interdisciplinary problems which touch several topics in mathematics. (4 weeks)

5.         Student presentations. (1 week)

註：第十七、十八週由學生閱讀指定論文自主學習。
